item.description:
Hey ladies!

Let's get our dancin' shoes on have some fun!

Vincents nightclub offers a $5.00 before 10pm on Saturday nights and the music is top 40. I've gone before and had an absolute blast! There is tons of parking and the club itself is quite large. There are areas for us to congregate on the upper level so we can either sit and socialize or dance...or both!! :-)

Dress code and directions can be found on the website link attached:

http://www.vincentsni...

Looking forward to another great night with Fabulous Women!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out an email as the date nears to decide where we can meet inside the club
item.name: Let's get our groove on at Vincents!!
